nws.name: Overnight
nws.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 29. North northeast wind around 5 mph.

nws.name: Tuesday
nws.detailedForecast: Sunny, with a high near 55. East wind 0 to 5 mph.

nws.name: Tuesday Night
nws.shortForecast: Mostly Cloudy then Chance Rain Showers
nws.detailedForecast: A chance of rain showers after 3am. Mostly cloudy. Low around 48, with temperatures rising to around 50 overnight. South wind 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

nws.name: Wednesday
nws.shortForecast: Chance Rain Showers then Mostly Cloudy
nws.detailedForecast: A chance of rain showers before noon. Mostly cloudy. High near 61, with temperatures falling to around 59 in the afternoon. Northwest wind around 5 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

nws.name: Wednesday Night
nws.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 44. Northeast wind around 5 mph.

nws.name: Thursday
nws.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy. High near 59, with temperatures falling to around 57 in the afternoon. East northeast wind around 5 mph.

nws.name: Thursday Night
nws.shortForecast: Mostly Cloudy then Slight Chance Showers And Thunderstorms
nws.detailedForecast: A slight chance of showers and thunderstorms after midnight. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 43. East northeast wind 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

nws.name: Friday
nws.detailedForecast: Rain showers likely. Cloudy, with a high near 50. Northeast wind 10 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%.

nws.name: Friday Night
nws.detailedForecast: Rain showers likely before midnight, then sleet and freezing rain and rain showers. Cloudy, with a low around 24. Northeast wind 10 to 15 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%. New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible. Little or no ice accumulation expected.

nws.name: Saturday
nws.detailedForecast: Snow showers likely and sleet likely and freezing rain likely. Cloudy, with a high near 30. Chance of precipitation is 70%. New snow accumulation of 1 to 3 inches possible. New ice accumulation of less than half an inch possible.

nws.name: Saturday Night
nws.detailedForecast: A slight chance of snow showers and a slight chance of freezing rain. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 16. Chance of precipitation is 20%. New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible. Little or no ice accumulation expected.

nws.name: Sunday
nws.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny, with a high near 31.

nws.name: Sunday Night
nws.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 19.

nws.name: Monday
